definition: atropine C17H23NO3, alkaloid drug derived from deadly nightshade (Atropa belladonna)
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: The excitatory effect of lidocaine can not be changed by pretreatment of hexamethonium bromide and atropine.
sentences.chinese: 此效应不受溴化六甲双铵和阿托品的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To verify the microbial limit test for atropine eye ointment.
sentences.chinese: 目的对阿托品眼膏的微生物限度检查进行方法验证。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo evaluate the characteristic of rabbit dry eye model.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价滴用阿托品建立兔干眼模型的优劣。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the content of atropine sulfate.
sentences.chinese: 目的测定硫酸阿托品的含量。

sentences.english: Conclusion 1% Atropine gutta mydriasis has no severe influence on children's activity.
sentences.chinese: 结论1%阿托品滴眼液散瞳对儿童活动无严重的影响。

sentences.english: Conclusion The microbial limit test of atropine eye ointment could be investigated by conventional method.
sentences.chinese: 结论对阿托品眼膏的微生物限度检查可按常规法进行。

sentences.english: Antihistaminic agents may control the atropine conjunctivitis.
sentences.chinese: 这种由阿托品引起的结膜炎，可用抗组胺类药物控制。

sentences.english: We should distinguish atropine overdosage from coma caused by pesticide poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 应注意鉴别阿托品过量中毒与农药中毒昏迷。

sentences.english: This experiment uses(HPLC) to determine the chlortetracycline residues amount in the pig plasma.
sentences.chinese: 采用气相色谱法测定猪血浆中阿托品的浓度。

sentences.english: Naloxone and atropine antagonized the effect of morphine on isolated small intestine.
sentences.chinese: 吗啡的小肠兴奋作用可被纳洛酮或阿托品阻断。

sentences.english: There was no significant difference in the size of pupils between the patients with and without atropine poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 阿托品中毒与非中毒者的瞳孔大小无显著性差异。

sentences.english: Atropine has negligible effects on the human uterus .
sentences.chinese: 阿托品对人体子宫的作用极微弱。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare atropine sulfate ophthalmic gel solution.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备硫酸阿托品眼用胶体溶液。

sentences.english: In addition, the pressor effect mediated by H_1- receptors in rabbits could beantagonised by atropine.
sentences.chinese: 家兔H_1受体调节的升压作用亦可被阿托品所阻断。

sentences.english: Now, atropine poisoning is sometimes very hard to tell ptomaine poisoning .
sentences.chinese: 告诉你们，阿托品中毒有时很难与食物中毒区别开来。

definition: propranolol (beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure)
to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
propranolol (beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure)
